channel.title: Error running server
channel.description:
Hi guys, relatively recently i've started getting this error when clicking 'run' on my server (server sided). It's delta.
[code]
JadPk Scape Server. Original source:DeltaScape Extra Features Coded by I Own Jad Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:112)
[/code]
Because of this, I can't login to server. It does login, but I see a blank screen.
I've recently added custom models like supreme claws and such, but that was all client sided, I didn't touch the server.
Any suggestions? (Don't say go to pi or those shizzle, I like delta =p).
screenshot of server.java: http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/543/serverz.png/

item.title: Error running server
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

add your model in Server sided

Read full topic

item.title: Error running server
item.dc:creator: @devilishomar devilishomar
item.description:
@devilishomar wrote:

Hi guys, relatively recently i’ve started getting this error when clicking ‘run’ on my server (server sided). It’s delta.


JadPk Scape Server.
Original source:DeltaScape
Extra Features Coded by I Own Jad
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10
        at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283)
        at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173)
        at server.main(server.java:112)

Because of this, I can’t login to server. It does login, but I see a blank screen.

I’ve recently added custom models like supreme claws and such, but that was all client sided, I didn’t touch the server.

Any suggestions? (Don’t say go to pi or those shizzle, I like delta =p).

screenshot of server.java: http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/543/serverz.png/

Read full topic
